introduction: The off-year elections will include gubernatorial and state legislative races in several states, alongside numerous mayoral and local office contests.

event: G20 Joint Finance and Health Ministerial Meeting
introduction: Held virtually, this meeting will focus on mobilising financing mechanisms to tackle global health challenges, particularly in the Global South.
Brazil will host COP30, aiming to achieve significant progress on global climate agreements.
Iraq will hold parliamentary elections amid uncertainty over a possible boycott by Shia cleric Muqtada al-Sadr.
Taking place at Finlandia Hall in Helsinki, the conference will explore how investing in health promotes sustainable development and well-being.
Chile will elect a new president and legislators, with right-wing candidate Evelyn Matthei favoured to win; a runoff is scheduled for 14 December if required.
Voters across Denmark will elect 2,434 local and 205 regional councillors in all 98 municipalities and five regions.
South Africa will host the 2025 G20 Summit under the theme 'Solidarity, Equality, and Sustainability,' focusing on climate resilience, debt relief, and inclusive growth.
Early elections in Republika Srpska follow a court ruling that revoked Milorad Dodik’s powers; Dodik has threatened to block the vote, heightening tensions.
EU and African Union leaders will meet in Luanda, Angola, to discuss peace, trade, green development, digitalisation, and human mobility.
Honduras will elect a new president, National Congress members, and 20 representatives to the Central American Parliament.
Prime Minister Narendra Modi will host President Vladimir Putin in India for the annual bilateral summit.
The 2025 Doha Forum will convene under the theme 'Diplomacy, Dialogue and Diversity,' emphasising global cooperation.

event: Sixth Anniversary of the Killing of Gen Qasem Soleimani
introduction: The anniversary of the U.S. killing of Iranian Gen Qasem Soleimani may trigger increased extremist propaganda activity.
Bangladesh will hold general elections, with the Bangladesh Nationalist Party expected to win and form the next government.

event: Fourth Anniversary of Russia’s Invasion of Ukraine
introduction: This anniversary will mark four years since Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine began in 2022.
